archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.5.4: The residual impact and likelihood ratings for each threat event affecting the target environment should be combined to produce an information risk rating (e.g. negligible, low, moderate or high) for each risk identified (sometimes referred to as a residual risk rating).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
